text:
Hi! I'm back now with loads of new photos. I think I'm going to pursue photography. :grin: I really enjoy it and I think I have the eye for it so I'm going to ask a family friend who runs their own photography business as to how to get into the industry and if I can work with them for a while. 
I like the idea of submitting my work to somewhere like the magazine you recommended but because I shoot a lot of nature I was wondering if you had any ideas if submitting photos to places like natgeo wild (maybe not that high profile but you get the idea :sweat_smile:) I was thinking of selling y2k photos to a national trust board or something? Any thoughts? Hope you're doing well!

Hi my boyfriend's really interested in game development (coding, animation etc) he wants to get some training to further his skills as he would like to enter a job in the industry, any suggestions, would love to hear from a pro.
